title: Bellman-Ford Algorithm
subject: Algorithms
theory:
Computes SSSP. Handles negative weights. 
Relax all edges V-1 times. If changes happen on Vth relaxation, Graph has Negative Cycle.
syntax: for i in ranges(V-1): for u,v,w in edges...

interview_questions.question: Why V-1 iterations?
interview_questions.answer: A loop-free path can have at most V vertices (V-1 edges). Information propagates 1 edge per iteration.
